name: Starter
subtitle: Begin with a small but powerful step.

features.name: Setup Admin and Branch panel on your hosting.
Configure User app, and delivery man app with your admin panel.
Customize App name, logo, Package Name, Splash Screen, etc.
Setup SMTP Mail configuration.
Setup OTP configuration.
Setup Payment & SMS gateways.
Setup third party API.
Configure Push notification.
One revision before project handover.
Upload User and delivery man apps to google play store.
Upload User and delivery man apps to the Apple store.
Upload Marchant, Kitchen and Kiosk apps to the google play store.
Upload Marchant, Kitchen and Kiosk apps to the Apple store.
